features: 🌈1080P FHD Portable Monitor - KYY Portable Monitor sports a 15.6 inch IPS panel with a 1920 x 1080 resolution at 60Hz, 178° viewing angles, a 1000:1 contrast ratio, presents vibrant colors on the screen. The HDR mode and Scene mode supports excellent mainstream transmission so that you can enjoy unprecedented gaming performance, KYY Monitor is ideal for multi-work, gaming, and general use.

💞Wide Compatible Monitor - With 2 USB-C Ports, Mini-HDMI Ports on one side, the portable monitor works with multiple devices like laptops💻, smartphones📱, PC, PS4, XBOX, or Nintendo Switch🎮, and more. No driver needed! It strengthened the ports' stability and solved the multi-wire winding problem, equipped with 3.5mm audio inputs, a real friendly design.

⚡️Travel Monitor for Laptop - This 0.3inch 1.7lb thin weight Portable Laptop Monitor is thin, lightweight, and travel-friendly, just like a tablet, suitable for taking with it everywhere. It boosts productivity, provides the extra screen space you need to stay organized, or extends your phone screen for movies or games while on the go.

⬛Upgraded Smart Cover Doubles as Stand - More stable foldable smart cover, made of durable, high-quality PU leather exterior, scratch-proof, soft lining, fully protect the screen. Two grooves in the cover base for more comfortable viewing angle choosing.

🎁Provide Everything You Need - KYY provides you an ultra-slim high-quality portable external monitor that can work in both landscape and portrait mode, a stable foldable smart cover, a screen protector film, 2 usb-c cable, mini-hdmi to hdmi cable. It has a unique designed premium black metal appearance, a friendly menu control wheel for setting, 2 built-in stereo speakers, and equipped with 3.5mm audio inputs to offer an enhanced entertainment experience when viewing videos and playing games.

What should I know before buying this monitor? 1, Phones without full-featured Type-C port need an adapter to connect. 2, Laptops without full-featured Type-C port need connected via HDMI & USB C to USB A cable. 3, Not suppot bluetooth, wireless and WIFI connection. No battery. Not touchscreen. What is each cable used for? 1, USB C to USB A cable, only for power supply. 2, USB C to USB C cable, for power supply & video output. 3, MINI HDMI to HDMI cable, only for video output. Note: For HDMI connection, pls use USB C to USB A cable to power up the monitor. Will any USB C to USB C cables work with this display? The USB C to USB C cable should be the USB C 3.1 Version one, which supports video ouput. Or the monitor will fail to be connected. I have charged the monitor for several hours. Why does it fail to turn on and show "no signal"? KYY portable monitor does not come with a built-in battery. Please connect the monitor with your device (like laptop, PC, Switch etc.) via [USB C to USB C cable] or [MINI HDMI to HDMI cable] & [USB C to USB A cable] for usage. How to connect the monitor with my iPhone? [KYY monitor- USB C to USB A cable- External Power Supply] [KYY monitor- MINI HDMI to HDMI cable- Lightning to HDMI Adapter(not included)- iPhone] [Lightning to HDMI Adapter- Apple Charging Cable(not included)- External Power Supply]

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great second screen!
reviews.reviewText: This screen works great as a second screen for my laptop. It easily fits within my laptop bag, is super lightweight and vibrant and colorful. I have not tested the functionality of the built-in speakers but knowing they're there is a nice little addition. Pairing either through HDMI cable with the extra power cable or USB-C is as easy as plugging it in. This works well if you're looking for something light and easy to take with you, or something to keep in place as a second monitor for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good purchase
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write product reviews, but I am so pleased with this monitor! I was going out of town and needed a second monitor to work remotely. The picture on this monitor is better than the one on my gaming laptop. It is plug and play, worked immediately, just plugged it in, set my monitor settings on my laptop, and off I went. I have also used it to plug in my Switch and a Firestick while on the road, and it was excellent for both purposes. Compact, fits in my laptop bag with my laptop. For this price (there was a coupon I paid about$75 after tax) this was everything I needed and more. It can be hard to sift through all of the available options for something on here, I scoured them all trying to balance price with reviews, and I can say that this one is a winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Great, Affordable, Clear, Easy to Use, Poor Sound
reviews.reviewText: I just got this set up, so I'll update my review later when I've put this through more usage... but my initial impression is very good.The display quality is fantastic. I've got it connected via USB-C from my Surface Laptop and it's fantastic. Plus, it's being powered by the laptop so I don't need an external power source. This is going to make my life a LOT nicer when I need to work in random places with my laptop.I plugged it into my Samsung S10+ phone via USB and was even more impressed. Like the laptop, it was powered by the phone and looked great. I'd never seen my phone on a display like that, but being able to launch Outlook and the browser from my phone was pretty cool. It felt like I was on a tablet. I'll have to play with this more. I only wish this display had a touch screen to really make it feel like a tablet.The device came with USB C and HDMI cables, plus an AC adaptor and cord -- so you're totally set unless you need some other connection type. A+ for that.There's a simple menu interface like nearly all monitors have for brightness, contrast, color, etc. But I didn't need to tune anything. It was all fine right out of the box.It came with a "smart cover" that uses magnets to hold itself into place. It's decent, but I don't trust those magnets. The cover doubles as a stand for a couple pre-determined positions, but I wish there were more angle options or an actual kickstand.The ONLY negative is that the sound quality was very, very poor. The speakers are tinny and quieter than those built into my laptop. I didn't buy this for sound, so I'm not disappointed, but anyone thinking about using this to amplify their game/movies better think twice. Just don't do it. On the plus side, it does come with a standard headphone jack which I suspect just passes the sound through from USB-C or HDMI. I haven't tried this yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good quality and a great value.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in anticipation of a long trip where I'd be working primarily from my laptop. I took a chance on this screen after reading the reviews and seeing people touting the value on it. After using it for a few weeks, I agree wholeheartedly.The Good:1. Build quality is excellent and feels like it should cost 2-3x as much.2. The LCD Panel is solid and has good brightness and sharpness.3. It includes a bunch of connection options in terms of wires and cables.4. No issues connecting even with a finicky HP Elitebook that doesn't have the best Thunderbolt Performance.5. Not overly power hungry.6. The included cover/stand is pretty good and not as bad as others have complained about.The Merely "OK"1. It has speakers but they are not great. I haven't gamed on it with a steamdeck or switch but I imagine the sound experience would suck.2. Doesn't come with a case; as good as the build quality is, it is still a thin, light, standalone LCD panel. I worry about packing it so I bought a padded case for it.In short, it's an excellent screen whose positives GREATLY outweigh any of the "negatives" (which aren't really negative.Buy with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't know this technology even existed!
reviews.reviewText: This monitor fills its role perfectly. The build quality is great with a sturdy screen, frame, and stand. It is lightweight and very thin and easily fits into my laptop bag. The fact that it can be powered and receive display through 1 Type-C going to my laptop is the best feature. It even has built in speakers so it really could be a standalone portable monitor if that's what you need. I just want to hedge your expectations though. As an ultra-portable monitor, it can't have the very best brightness or contrast or screen response, but it is so freaking impressive for what it is! Picture quality is far better than I expected it to be.
Don’t know if any issues do that means it’s good.

I’ve been using this monitor for almost a month and am quite happy with its performance. First of all, the connectivity is super easy and quick with the provided two-way USB-C cable. The monitor is always in ‘ready-to-use’ mode. The folding stand allows you to position the monitor at any convenient angle. Second, the display is crisp, soothing to the eyes with no glare and no blur. Third, but not the least, the battery life and charging is really good. Overall, it is really value for money and a highly recommended product.
